title: Enhance ralph-start with full worktree setup
description: Enhance ralph-start to fully set up the worktree with env files, dependencies, and dev server. Currently it only copies prd-json and progress.txt, leaving the worktree incomplete for projects that need more setup.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Copy .env and .env.local files to worktree (if they exist)
OR: Use 1Password injection via op run --env-file=.env.template
Add --install flag: run npm/bun install in worktree
Auto-detect package manager (npm, bun, pnpm, yarn)
Add --dev flag: start dev server in background after setup
Check for .worktree-sync.json config file for custom sync rules
- sync.symlinks: files to symlink instead of copy
Symlink node_modules if --symlink-deps flag (faster than install)
Show setup progress with clear status messages
Document all new flags in ralph --help and README
Test: ralph-start --install on a Node project
